backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access control, user profiles, syllabus items, and gamification state with maps and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing implemented UI logo, favicon, and asset-generation features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend components and pages for reference in build planning.
frontend/.env: Defines Vite deployment domain for development builds.
frontend/.env.production: Defines Vite deployment domain for production builds.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting title and linking favicon and app icon assets generated from the NCW logo.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller managing navigation between landing, maps, realms, chapters, boss fights, and showing header/footer.
frontend/src/components/AdventurePortalC: Clickable portal card component with themed colors, image, mission text, and animated hover effects.
frontend/src/components/EarnedXpBadge.ts: Badge component displaying earned XP with gold-themed styling and sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/GamificationHead: Displays the user’s gamification stats (level, XP progress, coins, streak) with navigation and a Hall of Fame button.
frontend/src/components/HallOfFameLeader: Shows a modal leaderboard ranking users by XP with profile lookup and rank icons.
frontend/src/components/PowerCard.tsx: Reusable card showing an image slice, title, description, and optional action button or icon.
Renders a rotating 3D geometric icon using react-three-fiber with locked/completed overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGamificationQuerie: Provides queries and mutations for gamification state, leaderboard, and completing boss fights.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains syllabus-related queries and mutations for fetching items and modifying tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserQueries.ts: Fetches all user profiles by iterating over gamification states and retrieving individual profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme color variables, and custom neon/glow animations and utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/bossFights.ts: Provides fixed boss fight question sets for science, maths, and SST with answers and explanations.
frontend/src/lib/confetti.ts: Implements a simple DOM‑based confetti animation for celebratory effects.
frontend/src/lib/contentModel.ts: Defines chapter and subject types and exports structured chapter lists for science, maths, and SST.
frontend/src/lib/statusTheme.ts: Empty placeholder file for status theme logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React rendering with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BossFight.tsx: Renders the boss fight quiz flow, scoring, completion logic, and reward UI with confetti.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardWarMap.tsx: Empty placeholder page for a war‑map style dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/DivideAndConquer.tsx: Empty placeholder page for Divide and Conquer section.
frontend/src/pages/PortalHome.tsx: Displays the animated home portal screen with branding, hero section, and start‑quest CTA.
frontend/src/pages/PortalMaths.tsx: Renders the Maths portal with themed PowerCards and a boss fight CTA. Uses props to trigger the boss fight.
frontend/src/pages/PortalScience.tsx: Displays the Science portal featuring physics and chemistry PowerCards and a boss fight starter button.
frontend/src/pages/PortalSocialScience.t: Shows the Social Science portal with history and geography PowerCards plus a boss fight CTA.
frontend/src/pages/RealmCivilizationQues: Builds the SST realm view showing kingdoms and chapter cards with completion states and navigation handlers.
Implements the linear maths dungeon with sequential chapter unlocking and chapter selection UI.
frontend/src/pages/RealmQuantumGalaxy.ts: Creates the science realm with planets, mission chapters, and completion-aware chapter cards.
frontend/src/pages/WorldMapHub.tsx: React page showing three realm cards (science, maths, sst) with themed visuals and a callback for realm selection.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDomain.ts: Utility for validating, sanitizing, and determining a canonical deployment domain based on environment or hostname.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and theme settings for the app.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, pending requests, and icon/image requirements.
